name: LUMINOUS (DelugeDrop)
description:
As a determined, powerful explorer, quest down the Neon Caves to find the treasure below... or something.

NOTE: If the HTML game doesn't work, try reloading the page.

I strongly recommend that you play on Windows by downloading the ZIP file below. It runs faster and it is fullscreen. Enjoy the game either way! :)

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

LEFT CLICK - Fire weapon

SCROLL WHEEL - Change selected weapon (Q and E on HTML)

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen on Windows

ESCAPE - Pause

This game was made for the GameMaker Studio 2 Amaze Me game jam, hosted by YoYo Games! 

This game was a blast to make, and I hope it is also a blast for you to play. :)

Have fun! (•◡•)

 - DelugeDrop
